modName: Hold guards carry iron arrows and weapons
descriptionHtml:
solitude and whiterun guards don\'t carry imperial swords but instead random iron weapons
solitude guards wear light bracers and boots
all hold guards have iron arrows now instead of steel
patrolling stormcloak and imperial groups will assist you in a fight if you are an ally

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541][img]http://i.imgur.com/jqeEV.jpg[/img][/url]
author: mrjentipede
